definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The cuting-to-Vary direction radiation pattern illustrates tha…
sentences.chinese: 用多切割面辐射方向图描述该天线的全向性。

sentences.english: All of phenomenology can be regarded as an unfolding of the idea of intentionality .
sentences.chinese: 所有的现象学都可以看作是意向性思想的延伸。

sentences.english: METHODS Bi-directional fermentation engineering was applied.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用双向性发酵工程。

sentences.english: Then they discovered that the directivity of the magnet.
sentences.chinese: 后来又发现了磁石的指向性。

sentences.english: The directional movement is called the horizontal mickey count and the vertical mickey count.
sentences.chinese: 方向性移动叫做水平米鼠数和垂直米鼠数。

sentences.english: First, I must disclose that I'm biased. I love my caffeine.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我必须说明，我是有倾向性的，我喜欢咖啡。

sentences.english: Photonasty A nastic movement in response to light.
sentences.chinese: 响应光刺激的向性运动。

sentences.english: Do you agree with the factor of Task type is the key factors influencing teamwork of project-oriented global virtual team?
sentences.chinese: 您赞同任务种类是影响项目导向性虚拟团队的因素吗？

sentences.english: One of the obvious characteristics of public communication is strong unidirectivity and weak feedback mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 大众传播的显著特点之一是单向性强，反馈机制弱。

sentences.english: The second A stands for action-oriented.
Conclusion Syntropy hemiopia is the most common type of change of field of vision affecting lesions in posterior visual pathways;
sentences.chinese: 结论同向性偏盲是后视路疾病最常见的视野改变类型。

sentences.english: Chapter IV reveals another important part in the thesis: the political dominance of news English.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是关于新闻英语的政治倾向性。

sentences.english: Requirement on bit steerability is satisfied with the bit's short gage and active gage protection design.
sentences.chinese: 短保径与主动保径设计，满足钻头导向性需求。

sentences.english: "The older we get, the more task-oriented we become, " explains R.
sentences.chinese: 年龄越大，我们越变得具有任务导向性。

sentences.english: J. Seale has boldly improved the traditional theory of intentionality.
sentences.chinese: 塞尔对传统的意向性理论进行了大胆的改进。

sentences.english: We're going to be reading it with a theoretical spin.
sentences.chinese: 我们将带着一种理论的倾向性来阅读本周的内容。

definition: variant Chinese character/alternative form of a Chinese character
